# MTLStructMember

**Class**

An instance that provides information about a field in a structure.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLStructMember
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] is part of the reflection API that allows Metal framework code to query details about an argument of a Metal shading language function. An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance describes the data type of one field in a struct that is passed as an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunction] argument, which is represented by [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument].

Don’t create [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instances directly. You obtain an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance from either the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType/members] property or the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType/memberByName(_:)] method of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] instance. The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember/dataType] property of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance tells you what kind of data is stored in the member. Recursively drill down every struct member until you reach a data type that is neither a struct nor an array.

## Describing the struct member

- **name**: The name of the struct member.
- **dataType**: The data type of the struct member.
- **offset**: The location of this member relative to the start of its struct, in bytes.
- **argumentIndex**: The index in the argument table that corresponds to the struct member.

## Obtaining struct member details

- **arrayType()**: Provides a description of the underlying array when the struct member holds an array.
- **structType()**: Provides a description of the underlying struct when the struct member holds a struct.
- **pointerType()**: Provides a description of the underlying pointer when the struct member holds a pointer.
- **textureReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying texture when the struct member holds a texture.

## Instance Methods

- **tensorReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying tensor type when this struct member holds a tensor.

## Shader types

- **MTLType**: A description of a data type.
- **MTLDataType**: The types of GPU functions, including shaders and compute kernels.
- **MTLArrayType**: A description of an array.
- **MTLStructType**: A description of a structure.
- **MTLPointerType**: A description of a pointer.
- **MTLTextureReferenceType**: A description of a texture.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
